commits.message:
Added retry logic around virDomainAttach() call in NC. Fixes EUCA-4021

Implements 3 retries with a 3 second sleep between retries. Addressed
the issue where libvirt would return errors that it could not attach
with an internal error. Each retry will log the error as attempt X of 3
and will display normal error output including the vol xml file on each
retry.
